 At Haleon we embrace our diverse workforce by creating an inclusive environment that celebrates our unique perspectives, generates curiosity to create unmatched understanding of each other, and promotes fair and equitable outcomes for everyone. We're striving to create a climate where we celebrate our diversity in all forms by treating each other with respect, listening to different viewpoints, supporting our communities, and creating a workplace where your authentic self belongs and thrives. We believe in an agile working culture for all our roles. If flexibility is important to you, we encourage you to explore with our hiring team what the opportunities are.
   

  

 As you apply, we will ask you to share some personal information, which is entirely voluntary. We want to have an opportunity to consider a diverse pool of qualified candidates and this information will assist us in meeting that objective and in understanding how well we are doing against our inclusion and diversity ambitions. We would really appreciate it if you could take a few moments to complete it. Rest assured, Hiring Managers do not have access to this information and we will treat your information confidentially.
   

  

 Haleon is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive equal consideration for employment without regard to race, color, national origin, religion, sex, pregnancy, marital status, sexual orientation, gender identity/expression, age, disability, genetic information, military service, covered/protected veteran status or any other federal, state or local protected class.
   

  

 Accommodation Requests
   

  

 If you require a reasonable accommodation or other assistance to apply for a job at Haleon at any stage of the application process, please let your recruiter know by providing them with a description of specific accommodations you are requesting. We’ll provide all reasonable accommodations to support you throughout the recruitment process and treat all information you provide us in confidence.

title: Senior Financial Controller
description:
Om tjänsten
   

  

 Do you have experience in finance, intercompany charge-out models, governance structures, and accounting rules and you looking for a new challenge?
   

  

 The Senior Financial Controller - Charge Outwe're looking for will be there to simplify as well as to secure fiscal compliancy, transparency and ease of execution of the Vattenfall intercompany flows by automation, centralization and standardization / harmonization.
   

  

 As a Senior Financial Controller - Charge Out you're a member of the CoE Charge Out and Transfer Pricing team within Subledger department mapped under Vattenfall Finance Business Services (FBS) Organization.
   

  

**What will you do?**
 As a Senior Financial Controller - Charge Out is responsible for running and developing the central / business specific calculations of Vattenfall internal charges in scope. She/he is responsible that the model, services, allocation keys and other specific metrics are correct and up to date.
   

  

 Senior Financial Controller - Charge Out acts as a SPOC towards business stakeholders and leads alignment, cooperation and quality assurance of the charges in scope.
   

  

 Your tasks and responsibilities:
   

  

* Run and provide quality assurance for central and business-specific charge-out calculations on a monthly or frequent basis.
* Monitor the correctness of allocated and automated charge-out postings done by the system.
* Lead internal charges governance and ensure compliance within the agreed scope.
* Act as the responsible leader for system development projects, new onboarding projects, and implement required model changes.
* Represent the CoE to internal Group customers (Business Areas - BA) for services rendered by Staff Functions (SF), such as BA Wind receiving SF Procurement charges.
* Serve as a business partner to stakeholders of internal charges, supporting them with information about the charge-out model and process.
* Collaborate with both SF & BA Controlling and FBS to ensure process adherence, data transparency, and charge-out model accuracy.


**Location**
 Katowice, Gliwice, Stockholm or Berlin.
   

  

 Din bakgrund
   

  

**Who are you?**
 As a Senior Financial Controller we expect you to have a minimum of 8 years experience working with financial processes in an international environment and that you will have a university degree in Finance or a related field. And to succeed you should have:
   

  

* Strong leadership experience from a recent role in Finance, including project and change management.
* Good understanding of global financial regulations and compliance requirements.
* Proficient in intercompany charge-out models, governance structures, and accounting rules.
* Expert skills in relevant financial systems (S4Hana ERP is a plus) and Office 365.
* Experience with complex system landscapes and various data sources.
* Fluent in business English.


 As teammember we are looking for an ambitious and proactive team player who's capable of working in international and virtual teams. And it would be great if you also see yourself as a;
   

  

* Strong leadership abilities, including project and change management.
* Drives change and continuous improvements while ensuring delivery.
* High sense of responsibility and ability to work independently.
* Skilled in managing and challenging stakeholder expectations respectfully and clearly.
* Proactive and solution-oriented approach.
* Ability to work effectively in large and complex organizations, handling internal and external interfaces.
* Strong advisory skills with excellent verbal and written communication.
* Experience in leading and mentoring charge-out controllers, providing guidance and support.


 Mer information
   

  

**Our offer**
 Good remuneration, a challenging and international work environment, and the possibility to work with some of the best in the field. You will be working in interdisciplinary teams and you can always count on support from committed colleagues. We offer attractive employment conditions and opportunities for personal and professional development.
   

  

**More Information**
 We welcome your application in English, no later than, 18th of April. We kindly request that you do not send applications by any means other than via our website and that you refrain from submitting a cover letter with your application. You apply quickly and easily by answering screening questions and attaching your CV.
   

  

 For more information about the recruitment process you are welcome to contact our recruiter Joany van Megen via email: joany,vanmegen@vattenfall.com.
   

  

 Trade union representatives in Sweden: Rolf Ohlsson, Per Svensson and Stefan Andersson for Akademikerna. Kjell Larsson and Cecilia Bodin for Ledarna. Patrik Nenzen, Annalena Karlsson and Simon Salomonsson for Unionen. Jan Svensson, Juha Siipilehto and Robert Lönnqvist for SEKO. To get in contact with the representatives, please call Vattenfall´s switchboard +46 8 739 50 00.
   

  

 Since Vattenfall is part of the Swedish critical infrastructure many of our positions are security classed. If this position is security classed the final candidate can be subject to a security vetting process, according to the Swedish legislation.
   

  

 At Vattenfall we are convinced that diversity contributes to build a more profitable and attractive company and we strive to be good role model regarding diversity. Vattenfall works actively for all employees to have the same opportunities and rights regardless of gender, ethnicity, age, transgender identity or expression, religion or other belief, disability or sexual orientation.
   

  

**We look forward to receiving your application!**
 Om oss
   

  

 Vattenfall is a European energy company with approximately 21 000 employees. For more than 100 years we have electrified industries, supplied energy to people’s homes and modernized our way of living through innovation and cooperation. We are looking for talented individuals who, in addition to their passion for their own role, also have strong team spirit and want to contribute to supporting a meaningful corporate mission.

title: Verksamhetscontroller
description:
**Om arbetsplatsen**
 Sigtuna kommun är en plats med stor spännvidd. Här ryms levande landsbygd, småstad och en internationell flygplats. Ett rikt kulturarv och kulturell mångfald. En stolt historia och stora framtidsplaner. Kanske är det därför drivkraften är så stark att växa, förändras och utvecklas. Det är också därför det är så spännande att arbeta här. Hos oss blir du del av en trevlig och prestigelös kultur där vi hjälps åt och tar tillvara på varandras kunskap, olikheter och erfarenheter. Arbetet är ofta omväxlande, ibland utmanande men alltid meningsfullt. Välkommen hit!
   

  

 Socialförvaltningen har ett brett ansvarsområde där myndighetsutövning och förebyggande insatser ingår, med mottagnings- och utredningsenhet, öppenvård, familjerätt, ekonomiskt bistånd och operativ enhet som arbetar med förebyggande insatser.
   

  

**Arbetsuppgifter**
 Staben söker nu en verksamhetscontroller som tillsammans med oss vill utveckla det systematiska kvalitetsarbetet, verksamhetsplaneringen och uppföljningen.
   

  

 I rollen som verksamhetscontroller ansvarar du för att samordna och sammanställa verksamhetens förutsättningar till, verksamhetsplan, verksamhetsberättelse och delårsrapporter som ska redovisas och rapporteras till nämnd. Du kommer att ha många kontaktytor och samarbeta med kollegor med olika kompetenser och ansvarsområden. Du har ett tätt samarbete med chefer inom våra verksamheter samt med ekonomicontroller för området.
   

  

 Arbetsuppgifterna består bland annat av:
   

  

* Medverka i verksamhetsplanering och uppföljning enligt kommunens årshjul och styrmodell
* Bereda ärenden och ta fram beslutsunderlag
* Ärendehandläggning gentemot nämnd
* Utredningar, remisshantering, rapportering och redovisning mot verksamhet och nämnd
* Omvärldsbevakning inom området gällande lagstiftning, med mera
* Identifiera utvecklingsmöjligheter och ta fram väl underbyggda beslutsunderlag för det operativa arbetet som verksamheternas chefer ska bedriva
* Andra väsentliga styrnings- och ledningsprocesser utifrån uppdrag och verksamheternas behov
* Stödja systematisk uppföljning av verksamheten
* Du deltar i det kommunövergripande nätverket för budget och verksamhetsuppföljning.


 Arbetsuppgifterna kan komma att förändras över tid.
   

  

**Kvalifikationer**
 Vi söker dig som har socionomexamen eller annan utbildning som arbetsgivaren finner likvärdig. Du har flerårig arbetslivserfarenhet inom socialtjänstens område och goda kunskaper om de lagar som styr verksamheten. Har du tidigare erfarenhet av att arbeta i politiskt styrd organisation ser vi det som meriterande.
   

  

 Du har goda kunskaper i det svenska språket och kan uttrycka dig väl i både tal och skrift då arbetet bland annat innefattar rapportskrivande och regelbundna presentationer av till exempel resultat, till såväl politiken, ledningsgrupp som medarbetare.
   

  

 Eftersom du i rollen som verksamhetscontroller kommer arbeta i flera olika system ser vi goda IT-kunskaper som meriterande. Du kommer bland annat arbeta i verksamhetssystemet Stratsys.
   

  

 För att lyckas i arbetet som verksamhetscontroller ser vi att du:
   

  

* Är självständig och tar ansvar för dina uppgifter och håller deadlines
* På ett strukturerat sätt driver dina processer för att uppnå resultat
* Kommer med nya idéer och angreppssätt i arbetsrelaterade frågor
* Löser problem som dyker upp utan att missa de långsiktiga strategierna
* Har god samarbetsförmåga och förmåga att skapa och underhålla relationer


 Varmt välkommen med din ansökan redan idag!
   

  

**Övrig information**
 Din ansökan gör du enkelt genom att bifoga ditt CV och svara på några urvalsfrågor kopplade till denna tjänst. Vi ber dig dock att inte bifoga personligt brev. Under rekryteringsprocessen kan tester förekomma. Dessutom genomförs ekonomisk och juridisk bakgrundskontroll på slutkandidaten som en del i Sigtuna kommuns trygghets- och säkerhetsarbete. Blir du vår slutkandidat kommer du att få mer information och kontrollen görs givetvis med ditt samtycke.
   

  

 Som anställd i Sigtuna kommun får du ta del av en rad förmåner, bl.a. blir du automatiskt medlem i Personalklubben där du kan delta i olika aktiviteter. Läs gärna mer om våra andra förmåner och hur det är att jobba hos oss i Sigtuna kommun!
   

  

 https://www.sigtuna.se/naringsliv-och-arbete/jobba-hos-oss.html
   

  

 Vi undanber oss erbjudanden om annonserings- och rekryteringshjälp.

title: Finnish Speaking Account Executive
description:
**Are you a results driven, Finnish speaking Salesperson? You might be our next Account Executive! 🚀** 




  





 We’re looking for you – a highly motivated salesperson ready to roll up your sleeves and achieve rapid success, both for yourself and for us.
 



  





 This is your chance to sell a groundbreaking B2B SaaS platform with short sales cycles – and
 **no commission cap!** 
 With Tendium’s platform at your disposal, you can reach new heights if you play your cards right.
 



  





**Who Are You?** 




 We’re looking for a driven and ambitious colleague with the right attitude. Relevant experience is a plus, but
 **MINDSET** 
 is key!
 



  





**What you bring:** 



* A
 **goal-oriented mindset** 
 — you’re motivated to reach the top.
* **Some sales experience** 
 , preferably in
 **B2B or SaaS** 
 .
* Fluency in Finnish, proficiency in English and at least a basic understanding of Swedish.



  





**Bonus points if you...** 



* Have
 **additional language skills** 
 — Swedish is especially valued, but other European languages (B2+ level and above) are a plus.
* Previous experience in a
 **tech company** 
 , familiarity with
 **public procurements** 
 or an
 **existing network in Finland** 
 are seen as advantages.



  





 You thrive on
 **building relationships, closing deals, and pushing through challenges** 
 , even when faced with a “no.” If you’re ready to grow with us, we’d love to hear from you!
 



  





**Your Role at Tendium** 




 As an Account Executive, you will drive new customer sales for Tendium’s SaaS platform in Finland and Europe. You’ll manage the full sales cycle, from prospecting to closing deals, with support from the marketing team.
 



  





**Responsibilities** 
 :
 


* Drive new sales via phone and video meetings.
* Qualify leads and initiate business discussions.
* Present Tendium’s value proposition.
* Build and convert a strong sales pipeline.
* Collaborate with the team to close deals.



  





*This is a full-time, permanent position with a six-month probation period, a base salary, and commission.* 




  





**About Tendium** 




 Tendium is an
 **AI-driven scale-up** 
 revolutionising
 **public procurement** 
 . We provide businesses with a
 **smarter and easier way** 
 to participate in public tenders. At
 **Tendium** 
 , you’ll be part of a growing team backed by strong investors. We’re
 **an engaged, friendly, and open team** 
 where every member gets the space to grow.
 



  





**Ready for the next step? 💼** 




 We look forward to your application! We are hiring continuously, so apply as soon as possible.
 



  





 Successful candidates in the recruitment process will be asked to record two short videos - one video
 **introducing yourself (in English)** 
 , and one with a
 **brief pitch where you sell Tendium to us (in Finnish)** 
 – as if we were a potential customer.
 



  





 To make this process even more efficient, sign in to your Connect profile and add your references at any stage.
 



  





 Please find additional information on our recruitment process here. If you want to know more about our culture and what you can expect when working at Tendium you can read more about it
 *here.* 




  





 We can’t wait to hear from you! 🚀

title: VP Merchant Development
description:
**Summary**
 This VP role is crucial for expanding Merchant and Partner relations, directly
   

  

 impacting our sales strategy. It lays the groundwork for core operations and
   

  

 future growth. You will drive sales growth in new markets through strategic
   

  

 planning, market analysis, relationship management, and innovation. With your
   

  

 leadership, Instabee will not only enter new markets but also thrive and achieve
   

  

 sales targets.
   

  

 You will lead the commercial agenda for operational excellence, ensuring a
   

  

 seamless merchant experience in our customer solutions. This role focuses on
   

  

 maximizing sales opportunities in international accounts and promoting
   

  

 collaboration across borders.
   

  

 As part of an entrepreneur-driven organization, you will have a unique
   

  

 opportunity to shape our future business success. You will excel at blending
   

  

 strategic planning with operational execution, collaborating closely with your
   

  

 team, local sales, key stakeholders, and strategic business partners.
   

  

**About Instabee**
 Founded in 2022 through the merger of Budbee and Instabox, Instabee is a
   

  

 leading last-mile delivery company with three consumer-facing brands: Budbee,
   

  

 Instabox, and Porterbuddy. Serving millions of consumers across Northern
   

  

 Europe, Instabee is aiming to become the leading European e-commerce
   

  

 enabler and shipping partner, always keeping the consumer at the heart of
   

  

 everything they do.
   

  

 Instabee are fast-paced, both in parcel delivery and business growth. The
   

  

 journey has expanded from Sweden to Scandinavia and parts of continental
   

  

 Europe, with no plans to stop anytime soon.
   

  

**About The Role**
 In this role, you will take on a critical operational function at Instabee, driving our
   

  

 growth initiatives through direct engagement with merchants and the
   

  

 management of key accounts together with different parts of the organization.
   

  

 You will be responsible for defining our vision and strategy, ensuring effective
   

  

 execution, and maximizing impact through systematic approaches. We prioritize
   

  

 speed, flexibility, and innovation while establishing a robust framework for growth
   

  

 Our mission is to create value for e-commerce merchants, enhance their
   

  

 success, and benefit our company and all end users.
   

  

**Your Future Team**
 You will drive sales, commercial goals, and operational results across all our
   

  

 markets, working both strategically and operationally with our local sales teams
   

  

 to achieve goals together with them.
   

  

 This role requires strong collaboration skills with stakeholders and involves
   

  

 recruiting and developing talent in line with the company’s growth objectives.
   

  

 You will report directly to Instabee’s new Chief Growth Officer.
   

  

**What You’ll Be Doing**
* Strategic Leadership: Design and implement an effective management


 system and key performance indicators (KPIs) to grow and realize the
   

  

 strategy for our global Merchant and Partner Business, while taking
   

  

 personal responsibility for maximizing market potential.
   

  

* Account Management: Oversee the management of key strategic


 accounts and lead acquisition efforts cross-border. You will play an active role in building relationships to ensure commercial excellence and drive growth, including establishing best practices and effective operational methods.
   

  

* Organizational Development: Recruit and train both local and central


 teams to excel in their roles and cultivate an innovative and success
   

  

 culture. Serve as an internal advocate for our merchants highlighting
   

  

 their needs and the potential opportunities you recognize for them in our
   

  

 expanding and competitive market.
   

  

* Business Development: Take charge of new business development and


 prospecting, negotiation, and the closing of complex opportunities,
   

  

 particularly those with significant cross-border potential, while guiding
   

  

 and facilitating your team as well as important stakeholders throughout
   

  

 the entire process.
   

  

* Data-Driven Decision-Making: Leverage data and insights to drive


 informed decision-making and deepen your understanding of merchant
   

  

 behavior and needs. As a leader, empower your team to enhance
   

  

 services and refine pricing strategies, fostering business development in
   

  

 this key area.
   

  

**We are Looking For**
 Instabee is looking for a proactive, results-driven leader who thrives in
   

  

 fast-paced environments and challenges conventional thinking while building
   

  

 sustainable growth frameworks together with the rest of the organization.
   

  

 You are skilled at building relationships, navigating complex business deals, and collaborating with clients and colleagues to create successful solutions.
   

  

 If you aspire to make a meaningful impact in a rapidly growing, competitive
   

  

 industry and excel in a culture that balances warmth and empathy with
   

  

 professionalism and ambition, then this is the ideal next challenge for you.
   

  

**More About You**
* Experience: 10+ years in sales and commercial excellence within


 enterprise sales with technical integration and a B2B2C model. A market
   

  

 that demands proven leadership in navigating complex environments and
   

  

 managing cross-functional teams in matrix organization.
   

  

* Skills: Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities, paired with excellent communication and presentation skills to inspire and influence


 stakeholders.
   

  

*Commercial and Technical Knowledge* 
 : A commercial mindset with
   

  

 sufficient technical knowledge for effective sales discussions,
   

  

 understanding product capabilities as well as client needs.
   

  

* Growth Focus: Familiarity with management systems, strategies and


 tools for driving growth, including data analytics, customer feedback, and
   

  

 market research.
   

  

* Education: Degree in business, finance, engineering, or a related field.


*Instabee is currently active in six countries, serving thousands of online*
*merchants, including ASOS, Zalando, Inditex, and H&M. The company is on*
*track to become the most devoted European e-commerce enabler and shipping*
*partner.*
*Since its inception, Instabee has prioritized consumer-centric and sustainable*
*solutions, offering deliveries to boxes and homes using muscle power,*
*electricity, renewable diesel, and biofuels. Through custom technical solutions,*
*Instabee ensures optimal fill rates and routing, minimizing unnecessary*
*transports. Instabee is supported by investors such as Kinnevik, Creades, and*
*EQT Ventures, among others.*
 We warmly welcome your interest in this position! Contact Instabee´s
   

  

 recruitment partner Lisbeth Hedberg for more information. Contact her at lisbeth@lhedberg.se or mobile: +46 70 523 2673 for more information or
   

  

 apply for the job at Teamtailor. We look forward to hearing from you as soon as
   

  

 possible!
   

  

 Instabee was founded in 2022 after combining Budbee and Instabox — two leading last-mile delivery companies with three consumer-facing brands: Budbee, Instabox and Porterbuddy. Instabee is present in six countries, serving thousands of online merchants, including ASOS, Zalando, Inditex and H&M and is on track to become the most admired European e-commerce enabler.
   

  

 Since the start, Instabee has focused on consumer-centric and sustainable solutions, offering deliveries to boxes and homes using muscle power, electricity, renewable diesel and biofuels. Through bespoke technical solutions, Instabee can guarantee optimal fill rates and routing, minimising any unnecessary transports. Instabee is backed by Kinnevik, Creades and EQT, among others.

title: Chef Betala
description:
*Är du en erfaren ledare med gedigen kunskap inom betala- och kortmarknaden inom banksektorn? Vill du leda ett sammansvetsat team och driva utvecklingen av Länsförsäkringar Banks betalningslösningar? Då kan rollen som Chef Betala vara något för dig!*
**Om jobbet**
 Som Chef Betala kommer du att ha en nyckelroll i att leda och utveckla bankens kort- och betalningslösningar. Du ansvarar för att säkerställa att betalprodukterna och tjänsterna möter kundernas behov och marknadens krav, samt säkrar levererad affärsnytta till länsförsäkringsbolagen genom ökad digitalisering och utveckling av produkter, tjänster och processer. Rollen innebär även att du leder och coachar medarbetare inom gruppen, samverkar med övriga intressenter inom banken samt bolag inom Länsförsäkringsgruppen. Du kommer också att representera banken vid branschgemensamma samarbeten, exempelvis Bankföreningen.
   

  

 Dina arbetsuppgifter kommer vara bland annat:
   

  

* Erbjudandepaketering och utveckling av produkter och tjänster
* Driva digitalisering och ökat kundvärde
* Prissättning och lönsamhetsansvar för kort- och betalaprodukterna
* Personalansvar för ca 11 medarbetare där du leder och utvecklar gruppen inom Betalaområdet
* Sponsor för utvecklingståget Mina Betalningar
* Kontinuerlig bevakning av omvärld och myndighetskrav
* Representera banken vid branschgemensamma samarbeten
* Säkerställa att produkter och tjänster efterlever rådande regelverk


**Vem är du?**
 Följande kommer göra dig framgångsrik i denna tjänst:
   

  

* Akademisk utbildning inom relevant område
* Erfarenhet från roller som produktägare/produktchef, helst inom betalaområdet
* Erfarenhet från banksektorn
* Erfarenhet av de infrastrukturella förflyttningar som nu sker inom betalmarknaden
* Erfarenhet av personalansvar, leda medarbetare med specialistkompetens samt leda i förändring
* God kännedom om ISO 20022 och SWIFT


 Meriterande är även om du har:
   

  

* Swedsec licens för ledning och kontroll
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med agila metoder och projektledning


 Som person är du kommunikativ och har förmåga att leda i förändring. Du kan växla mellan strategiska och operativa frågeställningar och agerar inkluderande med flertalet intressenter och kontaktytor. Din förmåga att navigera, ta beslut och prioritera i en föränderlig miljö kommer att vara avgörande för att lyckas och trivas i denna roll.
   

  

**Din ledarprofil**
 Att vara ledare hos oss innebär att du leder med riktning, empati och energi. Tillsammans ska vi samarbeta för helheten och göra det enkelt att driva initiativ och arbeta mot våra gemensamma mål. Vi säkrar prestation genom att skapa en miljö som främjar utveckling, där varje medarbetare uppmuntras att visa mod för att nå sin fulla potential. Genom att skapa en trygg miljö ger du plats för våra medarbetare att växa.
   

  

**Om oss**
 Betalagruppen är ett sammansvetsat gäng med lång och gedigen kompetens inom kort och betalningar. Chef Betala rapporterar till chef Produkt och Erbjudande som är en nybildad enhet inom PPO & IT (Produkt, Process, Operations och IT).
   

  

 Länsförsäkringar Bank är idag Sveriges femte största bank och erbjuder ett brett sortiment av produkter och tjänster till våra privat-, företag- och lantbrukskunder. I arbetet mot vår vision "Tillsammans skapar vi trygghet och möjligheter" hoppas vi att du vill bidra med ditt engagemang och nyfikenhet för effektivisering, AI samt omvärldsspaning av moderna verktyg och metoder för att driva vår utveckling framåt.
   

  

**Mer information**
*Låter det spännande? Då vill vi veta mer om dig! Välkommen med din ansökan redan idag. Vi arbetar löpande med denna rekrytering och kan komma att tillsätta tjänsten innan sista ansökningsdag.*
**Sista ansökningsdag: 2025-04-20**

title: Back End Engineer
company_industry: Information Technology & Services and IT System Data Services
description:
**Your role** 




 We are seeking a versatile Backend Engineer to join our dynamic team, contributing to the full software development lifecycle. You will be primarily responsible for backend development, utilizing Java and JavaScript to build robust and scalable services. A key aspect of this role involves designing, implementing, and maintaining efficient data processing. You will further contribute by handling the operational aspects of application deployments, ensuring high availability and performance.
 



  





 Your role requires a collaboration across teams, acting as a crucial bridge between frontend and backend development teams. You will facilitate effective communication and ensure seamless integration of APIs and services. You will participate in troubleshooting and optimizing existing systems and identify bottlenecks in both code and infrastructure. Maintaining and improving application deployments is a critical part of your role.
 



  





**Qualifications** 



* Good understanding of Computer Science fundamentals, preferably a University level degree in Computer Science or equivalent education
* You have many years of experience of building products involving both architectural design, development and deployment, preferably in Java
* You have deep experience in developing server-side Java
* You are experienced with server-side JavaScript in node.js
* Proficient with operations in hosting environments, in particular with container-based deployments and system administration of a Linux stack
* Good understanding of Web Architecture, in particular HTTP and REST
* Knowledge of common data formats such as JSON, CSV and XML
* Experience of Software Engineering best practices such as API design, Continuous Integration, Test-Driven Development, and Design Patterns
* Experience of working in teams and agile projects
* Ability to communicate fluently in English and Swedish



  





**Bonus skills** 



* Experience with ETL processes
* Experience of creating and shipping full fledged software products
* Experience implementing Software-as-a-Service for cloud environments
* Familiarity with W3C Semantic Web technologies and Linked Data (RDF, SPARQL, SHACL) and associated frameworks such as Eclipse RDF4J and Apache Jena



  





**What makes us unique?** 



* Flexible work environment: option for several remote working days per week
* International Team: we’re a mix of languages and nationalities
* Beautiful office with a lake view: the office is located centrally with a view of the lake Mälaren
* Excellent Equipment: we supply you with quality equipment when you work with us. Let us know what you need to thrive and we will get it for you
* More perks & benefits:
* Swedish language courses
* Generous training and wellness allowance
* Free yearly health checks
* Company bike you can use
* Company events like ice skating, hiking, canoeing etc.
* We strive for diversity in our team and strongly encourage applicants that are less represented in the tech sector.



  





**About the company** 




 MetaSolutions is a company based in Sweden, dedicated to innovative solutions for advanced data management by interlinking information using semantic technologies. Our vision is to be a leading company in supporting advanced data management processes using our product EntryScape (entryscape.com).
 



  





 The company is today seen as a thought leader within Linked Data solutions in Sweden and other EU countries. Long term customers include the Agency for Digital Government (DIGG) where MetaSolutions has designed and developed the national dataportal (dataportal.se). Today, over 100 Swedish public organizations use MetaSolutions’ software EntryScape.
 



 MetaSolutions is a subsidiary of the Swedish Internet Foundation with 120 employees in Sweden. The foundation is an independent, private foundation that works for the positive development of the internet and is also responsible for the Swedish top-level domain .se and the operation of the top-level domain .nu.
 



  





 Everything we do at MetaSolutions is based on Open Source, Open Standards and Open Data. Our customers are mainly located in Sweden, Switzerland, Italy and Germany.

title: Production engineer
description:
**🚀 Join Our Team VIPAS AB as a 🚀
   

  

 Do you have what it takes to thrive in the vibrant world of IT consulting? VIPAS AB, a burgeoning company, proudly invites you to embark on your next engaging project as our**
**About VIPAS**
 Imagine a world where your business technology perfectly aligns with your goals—efficient, scalable, and innovative. At VIPAS AB, that’s exactly what we strive to create. As an IT consulting company, we don’t just offer services; we deliver tailored solutions using cutting-edge technologies like Java and Python. Our team is well-versed in software development, DevOps, and engineering, bringing years of experience and expertise. Think of us as your trusted guide, leading your organization through the landscape of modern tech adoption, ensuring every step is taken with confidence and foresight.
   

  

**Job Description**
 Our client is facing exciting challenges and is now looking for more production engineers for Structures! An absolute requirement for the position is that you are fluent in Swedish and have good English. We are looking for driven and passionate employees who want to make a difference!
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* you work in a team within a value stream where your mission is, together with your team, to ensure that deliveries are made at the right quality, at the right cost and on time.
* You work daily to ensure quality and delivery and, more long-term, to implement planned improvement assignments.
* You coordinate activities related to tool manufacturing, tool design, production preparation, method technology and CAM/NC.
* The focus is robustness and zero defects, which we achieve through a mindset with a 100% focus on quality and with the help of quality tools such as PFMEA, SPC and Problem Solving.
* Strong teams are fundamental to achieving our goals, to which you within the team contribute both with your competence, curiosity and team spirit to create a working climate with a winning culture.
* You have a close dialogue with operators and other technicians in your daily work and participate in dialogue with customers regarding production technology issues.
* You participate in technology development and industrialize new methods, processes and working methods to meet strategies within the area and on the product


**Requirements:** 
  

  

* Qualifications Academic bachelor's degree, university studies or equivalent knowledge gained through experience.
* Knowledge of quality tools such as PFMEA, SPC, Problem Solving Swedish and English in speech and writing.
* You as a person To thrive in this role, you must be a team player with a will to win.
* You have your own drive and willingness to learn new things, both in working methods and technologies.
* You enjoy working in a team, are fearless and independent.
* You do not give up until you have received an answer or found a solution.


**Why Join Us?**
 Vipas AB offers attractive employment packages for IT consultants, aligned with the Teknikföretagen (Almega) collective agreement. Clients Working with us provides opportunities in diverse industries, allowing you flexibility and growth. If you’re driven and eager to face new challenges, join the VIPAS family.
   

  

 You'll be part of an innovative team driving the future of telecom, Automotive, Retail, and Banking. If you're ready to take on challenging projects and grow your career in a cutting-edge environment, this is the opportunity for you!
   

  

 Apply Now & Please feel free to reach me at swathianantu@vipas.se
   

  

 Note: Please do apply if you have Sweden PR/ citizenship OR a Sweden work permit.
   

  

**How To Apply**
 Interested candidates are encouraged to apply by submitting their resume and cover letter. Join us in driving innovation in the VIPAS AB!
   

  

 Please note! We offer continuously. That means that we sometimes remove the assignments before the deadline. If you are interested we recommend that you apply immediately.

title: Senior Operations Technician
description:

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*

* Good overview of the full stack, that includes virtualization and application systems
* Extra points for experience with Red Gate monitoring or Infra as Code

 10-04-2025

 We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.
   

  

 Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?
   

  

 We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: Data Engineer
description:
**Etac - Creating possibilities**
 Would you like a career where you can contribute to something meaningful? At Etac, you can pursue an interesting career journey while being part of a rewarding end goal – to improve people’s quality of life. Our medical aids promote abilities for people at all stages of life, helping children to develop new skills, prolonging independence for people in later life, and supporting caregivers in their daily work.
   

  

 We are a global company with sales all over the world, and with our roots and headquarters in Sweden. If you want a job where you can develop professionally while also making a positive difference to people’s lives – let's create new possibilities together!
   

  

 With a strong commitment to innovation and excellence, we continuously work to improve our products and processes. Data is crucial in this journey, supporting strategic decision-making and operational efficiency. We are now looking for a Data Engineer to strengthen our data capabilities and help drive a data-driven culture within Etac.
   

  

**Your Responsibilities**
 As a Data Engineer at Etac, you will play an important role in developing, optimizing, and maintaining data solutions that support our business operations. You will be responsible for extracting, transforming, and structuring data from various systems, ensuring its quality and availability for analytics and reporting. You will work closely with the Data Governance team, IT, and business stakeholders to enable efficient data flows, support business intelligence needs, and contribute to data-driven decision-making across the organization.
   

  

**Your Main Responsibilities Include**
* Developing and maintaining data pipelines (ETL/ELT) to extract, transform, and load data from enterprise systems such as CRM, Finance, and Product.
* Ensuring data reliability, quality, and consistency by implementing best practices for data transformation and processing.
* Supporting data integration across multiple platforms, ensuring smooth and efficient data flows.
* Collaborating with the Data Governance team to align with data quality, security, and compliance requirements.
* Managing structured and unstructured data across cloud-based storage solutions such as Snowflake or Azure Synapse.
* Enabling business intelligence and reporting solutions by ensuring data is structured and optimized for Power BI, Tableau, Qlik, or Looker.
* Providing technical support and troubleshooting for data processing issues and performance optimization.
* Working with stakeholders across different product brands to support data-driven decision-making and reporting needs.


**Your Profile**
 We are looking for a skilled Data Engineer with a strong technical background in data processing, integration, and storage. You understand how to structure and optimize data for analytics and reporting.
   

  

**To Be Successful In This Role, You Should Have**
* 5+ years of experience in data engineering or a similar role.
* Strong SQL and Python skills for data processing, automation, and integration.
* Experience with ETL/ELT tools such as dbt, Apache Airflow, Pentaho, Talend, or Informatica.
* Familiarity with cloud data platforms and modern data architectures.
* Experience working with business intelligence tools such as Power BI, Tableau, Qlik, or Looker.
* Understanding of data governance principles and compliance requirements, including
* General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) – Ensuring proper handling of personal data and privacy compliance
* ISO 27001 – Supporting information security best practices.
* Data Quality & Integrity Standards – Implementing policies to maintain accurate, consistent, and reliable data.
* Access Control & Role-Based Permissions (RBAC) – Enforcing secure data access policies.
* Data Lineage & Auditing – Tracking data movement and transformations for transparency.
* Ability to collaborate with technical and non-technical stakeholders across multiple teams.


 Merit: Experience working with ERP systems, particularly Infor M3.
   

  

**Why Etac?**
 We Are a Dynamic Company On An Exciting Journey, With Job Opportunities In Several Career Fields And Many Parts Of The World. As Part Of Our Team, You Will Work In a Place That Values
   

  

* Contributing to solutions that improve people’s lives.
* Opportunities for professional growth within the organization.
* A healthy work-life balance.
* Freedom with responsibility.


**Application Process**
 If you are passionate about data engineering and want to be part of a collaborative and innovative environment, we would love to hear from you. Please submit your application and CV. We are reviewing applications on a rolling basis, so we encourage you to apply promptly. Do you have further questions, don't hesitate to contact the hiring manager Zahra Katibeh at zahra.katibeh@etac.com

title: Data Modeller
description:
**Job Description**
*Insights & Data is a global business line within Capgemini, consisting of 27,000 experts. Our focus? To create groundbreaking machine learning and AI solutions with reliable and scalable data platforms. From business analysis to Gen-AI, we cover it all! We work across all industries and have a collaborative environment and culture where your unique perspective matters.
   

  

 The places that you work from day to day will vary according to your role, your needs, and those of the business; it will be a blend of Company offices, client sites, and your home; noting that you will be unable to work at home 100% of the time.*
**YOUR ROLE**
 We are now looking for an engaged Data Modeller with experience in the financial sector. In this role, you will work across multiple solutions and technologies within the team's scope and be responsible for data modeling and data architecture solutions.
   

  

 Additionally, you will:
   

  

* Create and maintain conceptual, logical, and physical data models for databases and data warehouses.
* Optimize data structures for performance, scalability, and reliability.
* Work closely with business analysts, data architects, and software developers to understand data needs.
* Collaborate with stakeholders to gather and analyze requirements for data-related projects.
* Ensure data models align with organizational standards and governance policies.
* Develop and enforce data modeling best practices and standards.


**YOUR PROFILE**
 To be successful in this role, we see that you have approximately 5+ years of experience in data modeling with a background in the financial sector. You are proficient in gathering and analyzing requirements, creating conceptual, logical, and physical data models, and optimizing data structures using tools like Erwin, IBM Data Architect (or similar). You should also be familiar with ETL processes, data warehousing, and data lakes.
   

  

 Additionally, we value:
   

  

* A Bachelor’s degree (or equivalent) in information technology or computer science
* Previous consulting experience
* Excellent communication skills, fluent in English
* A solid understanding of data governance frameworks and best practices
* Familiarity with big data and relational database systems


**About**
**WHAT WE BELIEVE YOU WILL ENJOY ABOUT WORKING HERE**
 We value the importance of flexible work arrangements to support our employees' daily lives. Whether it's remote work or flexible working hours, our goal is to create an environment where you can maintain a healthy work-life balance. At the heart of our mission is your career growth. Our range of training, career programs, and various roles are designed to help you explore a world of opportunities. Whether you want to equip yourself with valuable certifications or develop your role as a leader, we want to ensure we offer what you need.
   

  

*Capgemini is a global business and technology transformation partner, helping organizations to accelerate their dual transition to a digital and sustainable world, while creating tangible impact for enterprises and society. It is a responsible and diverse group of 340,000 team members in more than 50 countries. With its strong over 55-year heritage, Capgemini is trusted by its clients to unlock the value of technology to address the entire breadth of their business needs. It delivers end-to-end services and solutions leveraging strengths from strategy and design to engineering, all fuelled by its market leading capabilities in AI, cloud and data, combined with its deep industry expertise and partner ecosystem. The Group reported 2023 global revenues of €22.5 billion.*

title: Platform Engineer
company_industry: Telecommunications and IT Services and IT Consulting
description:
Want to be part of shaping data governance at Telia and building Telia’s metadata management platform? We are now looking for an
 **engineer for Data Governance and Privacy Operations team** 
 in our Technology IT organization an exciting opportunity to join the journey to strengthen our data catalog and data lineage capabilities and help organization to unleash the power of data.
   

  

 The Data Governance & Privacy Operations team is responsible for building, securing and maintaining data governance & privacy at Telia which supported by our data governance tool suite. We play a key part in building the enterprise data catalog for Telia Company.
   

  

**As a Platform Engineer you will…**
 You will have a key role in the data governance team in supporting the
 **technical vision** 
 ,
 **roadmap** 
 , and
 **design** 
 for our
 **data governance** 
 tool stack in collaborating with the product owner and engineers. You will collaborate with stakeholders and play an important part in building target capabilities for the data governance tool suite and scaling of the tool suite within the organization.
   

  

 Your responsibilities will include supporting the Product Owner and Lead Engineer in achieving the vision and roadmap for the Data Governance tool suite, which includes the data catalog, data lineage, business glossary, and data quality. You will actively participate in
 **solution design, technical development** 
 , and
 **troubleshooting** 
 of the
 **data catalog** 
 . Additionally, you will handle maintenance, troubleshoot issues, and collaborate with stakeholders to ensure uninterrupted system performance and usability. Furthermore, you will stay updated on the latest market trends and industry best practices to continuously refine and update the technical vision. You will work with a wide set of stakeholders including software engineers, product owners, delivery leads, solution architects, data engineers and data architects.
   

  

 We are on a journey to become the new generation telco, and we believe that we can offer you an interesting opportunity where you will take part in continuous learning, work on improvements with your colleagues, and have fun along the way!
   

  

**Who We’re Looking For**
 You are someone self-driven who is
 **passionate about data** 
 and
 **engineering** 
 . You can express your vision clearly and have earlier experience in designing technical solutions. You are communicative and enjoy working in collaboration with multiple stakeholders to define needs and requirements.
   

  

 You are a self-driven and motivated professional who understands and anticipates stakeholder needs, demonstrating this in your proposed solutions. You approach problems in a structured and collaborative manner, identifying both short- and long-term solutions. Your curiosity enables you to quickly acquire new knowledge and apply it effectively, while you actively seek and act on feedback to enhance solution quality.
   

  

 With
 **3+** 
 years of experience working with
 **enterprise-level IT solutions** 
 , you have expert proficiency in
 **Python** 
 and
 **Kubernetes** 
 . You bring strong knowledge and experience in
 **PySpark** 
 ,
 **Java** 
 ,
 **Airflow** 
 ,
 **Unix** 
 , and open-source solutions. Your background includes solution design and integrating various technologies such as
 **REST** 
**APIs** 
 ,
 **Java** 
 ,
 **Python** 
 , and
 **JSON** 
 . Experience with
 **GitHub** 
 ,
 **Airflow** 
 , and
 **AWS** 
 is considered a plus. Additionally, you have a solid understanding of data warehousing concepts, including data modeling, data architecture, and data ingestion methods and practices. You possess professional proficiency in both spoken and written English.
   

  

 (Monthly salary range for this position: 3908 - 5863 EUR before tax deduction. This range is applicable for candidates based in Lithuania).
   

  

**We are more than a workplace**
 Join our inclusive team and collaborate with over 15,000 talented colleagues from around the globe. Recognized as a Climate Leader in the Nordics and Baltics, we're passionate about creating great products and delivering extraordinary customer experiences while always prioritizing sustainability. We believe our people are our most valuable asset, ensuring everyone feels welcome and valued. When you join us, you'll receive a comprehensive benefits package tailored to your local market, opportunities for remote work, and more. You'll also have the chance to earn a bonus based on your performance and Telia's results. If you want to make a real impact, this is the place where you belong.
   

  

**Ready to make better happen?**
 We´re looking forward to your application by 18/04/2025. Selection will take place on an ongoing basis and this position might be filled before the application deadline. Please apply through our recruitment system to keep your data safe, as we can’t accept resumes via email. Required background checks will be performed
   

  

 Got questions? Please reach out to Augustas Degutis (augustas.degutis@teliacompany.com) or Shifan Mihilar (shifan.mihilar@teliacompany.com).
   

  

**Join us and let’s make better happen – together!**

title: Specialistadministratör Technical Services
description:
Vill du arbeta i en roll där struktur, noggrannhet och service står i centrum? Trivs du i en administrativ roll där du får hantera avtal, fakturering och ha kontakt med både kunder och interna team? Då kan du vara den vi söker!
 



  





**Din roll** 




 Som Specialistadministratör blir du en nyckelperson i vårt team, med ansvar för administration och fakturering av våra servicekontrakt. Du säkerställer att avtal hanteras korrekt, följer upp fakturering och ser till att våra kunder får den service de förväntar sig. Rollen innebär många kontaktytor, både internt och externt, och du kommer att arbeta nära våra specialistsäljare inom Technical Services och ekonomiavdelningen.
 



  





**Dina huvudsakliga uppgifter som Specialistadministratör** 



* Hantera administration och uppföljning av servicekontrakt.
* Säkerställa korrekt fakturering av avtal enligt överenskomna villkor.
* Stötta sälj- och kundteam med information om befintliga avtal.
* Säkerställa att avtal och kontrakt uppdateras och efterlevs.
* Ha löpande kontakt med specialistsäljare och kunder kring fakturerings- och avtalsfrågor.
* Bidra till att utveckla och förbättra processer inom administration och fakturering.



  





**Vem är du?** 




 För att lyckas i rollen tror vi att du är en strukturerad och lösningsorienterad person som gillar att arbeta administrativt. Du har ett öga för detaljer, är noggrann och trivs med att hantera siffror och avtal. Dessutom är du en lagspelare som gärna samarbetar med olika delar av organisationen.
 



  





 Vi ser gärna att du har:
 


* Erfarenhet av administrativt arbete, gärna inom fakturering eller avtalshantering.
* God system- och datorvana, samt erfarenhet av att arbeta i affärssystem och Excel.
* En känsla för struktur och ordning, med förmåga att hantera flera uppgifter samtidigt.
* God kommunikationsförmåga, både skriftligt och muntligt, på svenska och engelska.
* Erfarenhet från en liknande roll inom exempelvis IT, tjänsteförsäljning eller ekonomi är meriterande.



  





**Om Atea** 




 Visste du att Atea är den ledande leverantören av IT-infrastruktur i Norden och Baltikum? I Sverige är vi runt 2700 medarbetare fördelade på 35 kontor runt om i hela landet. Vår styrka ligger i vår kombination av lokal närvaro, vårt omfattande och heltäckande erbjudande samt alla våra specialister. Tillsammans med våra kunder och partners bygger vi Sverige med IT och förbättra vardagen för skolbarn, lärare, äldre, sjukvård och näringslivet. Hos oss får du vara en del av världens mest hållbara IT-servicebolag, där vi är med och påskyndar omställningen mot en mer hållbar IT-värld.
 



  





 På Atea blir du en del av en vardag och en kultur som präglas av framåtanda, laganda och humor. Vi har en vision om att vara "The Place to Be" - en plats där alla växer och trivs, med kollegor som bryr sig om dig, om kunderna och om samhället.
 



  





**Kontakt & mer information** 




 Har du frågor om tjänsten är du välkommen att kontakta Stefan Claesson, Head of Customer Success & Technical Services, via stefan.claesson@atea.se. Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande och tjänsten kan tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdatum, ansök därmed redan idag!
 



  





 Som en kvalitativ del i vår rekryteringsprocess genomgår slutkandidater en bakgrundskontroll, detta för att öka kännedomen om dig som vår framtida medarbetare.
 



  





 Atea vill vara The Place To Be, den självklara platsen, för alla människor då vi värdesätter och jobbar aktivt med mångfald och inkludering.
 



  





 Vi hoppas på att få se din ansökan!
 



**Följ oss i sociala medier**

title: Oracle ERP developer to SEB Pension & Försäkring I Stockholm
description:
Are you passionate about technology and making a difference? Join us in the role as Oracle ERP Developer in our digital transformation journey and be a part of our highly skilled engineering team.
   

  

 Since SEB was founded in 1856, our focus on customers and long-term relationships has been at the heart of our success. We aim to drive positive change by providing capital to help everyone reach their goals and accelerate progress towards a sustainable tomorrow.
   

  

 Life & Pension in SEB is one of the largest pensions and insurance provider in Sweden and we serve both corporate and private customers. Our offering consists of products and services for important life events and by this we create certainty in an uncertain future. As a subsidiary in a large financial service group, we are able to benefit from a small company’s advantages that give you as an employee the possibility to influence and at the same time get access to a large company’s possibilities to develop and grow.
   

  

**About The Role**
 As an ERP Developer, you'll be a key expert on the Oracle Cloud platform, playing a crucial role in supporting our Finance functions with Oracle tools. Your responsibilities will include designing and configuring Oracle solutions tailored to best practices for our business.
   

  

 You'll ensure our Oracle processes align perfectly with business needs, vigilantly monitoring and fine-tuning systems for optimal performance. You'll also be at the forefront of problem-solving and incident management, making a real impact on our operational success.
   

  

 To thrive in this role, we believe you have
   

  

* Have a couple of years of experience in configuring and developing Oracle ERP solutions.
* A background in accounting or other finance-related areas.
* Strong analytical skills with the ability to manage complex information effectively.
* Excellent problem-solving abilities and a proactive mindset.
* Have strong communication skills and you are fluent in both Swedish and English.
* Academic background within Computer Science or equivalent.


**Bonus Qualifications (Nice To Have)**
* A strong eagerness to learn and work with Oracle EPM applications (FCCS, PBCS etc).
* Understanding of CI/CD processes and best practices.
* Familiarity with .NET programming is a plus.


 What we offer
   

  

* Friendly and welcoming culture
* Innovative company at the forefront of technology
* Agile and modern ways of working
* Attractive compensation and access to SEB staff banking with exclusive benefits.


 Ready to take the next step on your career journey?
   

  

 Since we select candidates continuously, feel free to send in your application today, but no later than 20th of April 2025. If you have questions about the position, please contact Bo Anell, Head of IT Financial and Regulatory Reporting by email bo.anell@seb.se.
   

  

 Please be aware that our final candidates undergo background checks, a process that includes for example identity control, verification of qualifications, credit checks, company engagements and criminal records checks. In some cases, we also apply random drug checks.
   

  

**Learn more about working at SEB** 
 on our Career website or through our Career podcasts.
   

  

 https://sebgroup.com/career
   

  

 https://bit.ly/SEBcareer

title: RO Tumba Södra söker IT-pedagog 60%
description:
Vill du ha meningsfulla arbetsuppgifter som gör skillnad i människors liv? Välkommen till kommunen som är långt ifrån lagom! Botkyrka kommun är den sjätte största kommunen i Stockholms län och består av kommundelarna Alby, Fittja, Hallunda, Norsborg, Tullinge, Tumba, Vårsta och Grödinge. Botkyrka kommun har cirka 95 000 invånare och drygt 6 400 medarbetare.
   

  

 Utbildningsförvaltningen ansvarar för förskola, fritidshem, grundskola, gymnasium samt anpassad grund- och gymnasieskola. Vi har drygt 3 200 medarbetare vid 45 förskolor, 22 grundskolor och fyra gymnasieskolor. Här finns ett stort engagemang för att alla barn och elever ska få undervisning av hög kvalitet, möjlighet att utvecklas och att nå sin fulla potential. I Botkyrka ser vi att framgång i skolan är nyckeln till ett gott liv och den starkaste skyddsfaktorn för framtiden.
   

  

 Tjänsten och arbetsuppgifterna
   

  

 Vi söker en IT-pedagog som kommer att arbeta både på Kassmyraskolan och Broängsskolan. I denna tjänst kommer du att ha ansvar för att stödja och utveckla elevernas IT-kompetens och digitala färdigheter inom både fritidshemmet samt mellan- och högstadiet. Arbetet innebär både planering och genomförande av undervisning där digitala verktyg används som en naturlig del av lärandet.
   

  

 Din roll
   

  

 I rollen som IT-pedagog arbetar du med att utveckla skolans undervisning genom att integrera digitalisering, aktuell forskning och beprövad metodik och didaktik för att ge elever och personal ett varierat arbetssätt med hjälp av olika verktyg. Du stödjer, informerar, fortbildar och handleder både elever, personal och skolledning i användning av digitala verktyg och digitala lärresurser.
   

  

 I rollen ingår dessutom följande arbetsuppgifter:
   

  

 Öka personalens och elevernas kunskap om och förståelse för hur digitala verktyg, sociala medier, bild, ljud och film kan användas i lärandet.
   

  

* Vara ansvarig för och drivande i skolans digitala utvecklingsgrupp.
* Delta i arbetslagsmöten.
* Arbeta tillsammans med fritidshemmet och fritidsklubben för att erbjuda aktiviteter där digitaliseringens kreativa möjligheter står i fokus, som exempelvis skol-tv, poddar, digitalt skapande, programmering med mera.
* Stödja elever i deras lärande med hjälp av digitala verktyg och digitala lärresurser.
* Samverka med kollegor för att utveckla individanpassade digitala verktyg och arbetsmetoder.
* Vara uppdaterad kring programvaror, appar, webbtjänster och digitala hjälpmedel samt introducera och handleda pedagogerna utifrån deras behov.
* Hålla dig uppdaterad om informationssäkerhet, avtal, regelverk, policys och riktlinjer.
* Samarbeta med skolans IT-samordnare kring skolans digitala infrastruktur och verktyg.


 Din kompetens och erfarenhet
   

  

 Vi söker dig som har dokumenterad kunskap och erfarenhet av digitalisering. Du har ett lösningsorienterat arbetssätt och ser sammanhang på övergripande nivå, samtidigt som du har en serviceorienterad inställning.
   

  

 Tidigare erfarenhet av arbete som IT-pedagog eller kunskap och erfarenhet av kompetensutveckling inom IT.
   

  

 Personliga egenskaper vi söker
   

  

 Som person är du relationsskapande och har en god förmåga att samtala med både elever och kollegor. Du har förmågan att sätta gränser och använder dig av ett lågaffektivt bemötande av elever. Du har en god kommunikativ- och samarbetsförmåga, både med elever och personal. Du är trygg, tillitsskapande och inser vikten av att vara en vuxen förebild.
   

  

 Vi erbjuder dig
   

  

 Broängsskolan och Kassmyraskolan erbjuder en inspirerande arbetsmiljö där fokus ligger på trygghet, lärande och utveckling för både elever och personal. Här får du möjlighet att arbeta med engagerade kollegor i en skola med hög andel behörig personal. Båda skolorna ligger i natursköna områden med goda kommunikationer och en nära relation mellan personal och elever.
   

  

 Om rektorsområdet
   

  

 Broängsskolan är en F-9 skola och ingår i ett rektorsområde tillsammans med Kassmyraskolan F-6 samt Kassmyras anpassade grundskola 1-6. Skolan ligger i ett lugnt och naturskönt område med goda kommunikationer. Här finns en mycket hög andel behörig personal och en stark känsla av trygghet, livsglädje och närhet mellan personal och elever. Skolmiljön uppmuntrar till kreativt skapande och lärande, och vi strävar efter att alla elever ska få möjlighet att växa i egen takt samtidigt som vi uppmuntrar till att våga lite mer.
   

  

 Du som söker till oss
   

  

 Krav: - Intresse för IT och pedagogik samt förmågan att snabbt skapa relationer med elever.
   

  

* Goda IT-kunskaper och erfarenhet av att arbeta med digitala verktyg inom utbildning.


 Meriterande: - Tidigare erfarenhet av att arbeta inom skola, fritidshem eller pedagogik med fokus på IT och digitalisering.
   

  

 För tjänster på Utbildningsförvaltningen i Botkyrka kommun kommer du som blivande medarbetare att genomgå en bakgrundskontroll.
   

  

 Läs mer om bakgrundskontroller här: https://www.botkyrka.se/bakgrundskontroll
   

  

 Om oss Botkyrka är en kommun full av kontraster där storstadens förortsmiljö möter landsbygdens skogar, ängar, sjöar och havskust. Här talas över 100 språk, här bor och arbetar människor med bakgrund från hela världen. Vi erbjuder en inspirerande arbetsplats full av möjligheter där vi tillsammans skapar de bästa förutsättningarna för en hållbar framtid. Vi har goda och trygga arbetsvillkor med kollektivavtal och flera förmåner för att du ska trivas och utvecklas på jobbet. Läs mer här: Vårt arbetsgivarerbjudande Övrig information För tjänster inom exempelvis vård-skola-omsorg i Botkyrka kommun behöver du som blivande medarbetare visa utdrag ur Polisens belastningsregister. Vi arbetar med kompetensbaserad rekrytering för att kvalitetssäkra rekryteringsprocessen och därmed motverka diskriminering.

title: Senior Security Engineer, AWS International Security Team
job_function: Quality Assurance, Information Technology, and Engineering
description:
**Description**
 Job Description:
   

  

 Come and join a creative, diverse, and collaborative team that is changing how we think about Cloud Security! At Amazon Web Services (AWS), Security is our highest priority. The International Security team is responsible for driving innovative enhancements that raise the bar for how AWS employees delivery security Of the cloud to support customer facing engagements.
   

  

 Key job responsibilities
   

  

 Key job responsibilities
   

  

 As a Senior Security Engineer, you’ll help to build and manage security controls that detect and automate the mitigation of cybersecurity threats across Amazon’s infrastructure. You’ll be working for government and regulated industries to understand their detailed security needs. You’ll work with data scientists, software development engineers, and other security engineers across multiple teams to develop innovative security solutions. Our services protect the AWS cloud for all customers and preserves our customers’ trust in us. You’ll get to use the full power and breadth of AWS technologies to build services that proactively protect AWS customers, both internally and externally, from security threats.
   

  

 You will be working in a team of industry-leading security experts working with knowledgeable customers to operate and continuously improve industry-leading security programs and processes. This team manages the underlying security programs and processes for personnel security, physical and logical accreditations, education, awareness and training, assurance, and cyber security. This position will have visibility at senior levels of government agencies, commercial institutions, and AWS including interaction with CISOs, CTOs, their staffs, and AWS senior leadership.
   

  

 In addition to a strong understanding of security technologies, tool development, offensive and defensive security tactics, and ideally some experience with distributed systems, you’ll need a number of other qualities to be successful in this role. The team has a mix of experience levels, and we’re building an environment that celebrates knowledge sharing and mentorship.
   

  

**About The Team**
 Diverse Experiences
   

  

 Amazon values diverse experiences. Even if you do not meet all of the preferred qualifications and skills listed in the job description, we encourage candidates to apply. If your career is just starting, hasn’t followed a traditional path, or includes alternative experiences, don’t let it stop you from applying.
   

  

 Why AWS
   

  

 Amazon Web Services (AWS) is the world’s most comprehensive and broadly adopted cloud platform. We pioneered cloud computing and never stopped innovating — that’s why customers from the most successful startups to Global 500 companies trust our robust suite of products and services to power their businesses.
   

  

 Work/Life Balance
   

  

 We value work-life harmony. Achieving success at work should never come at the expense of sacrifices at home, which is why we strive for flexibility as part of our working culture. When we feel supported in the workplace and at home, there’s nothing we can’t achieve in the cloud. Since the Covid19 pandemic we adjusted to remote work and established a hybrid work environment in which engineers spend 3 days working in the office, adjusted to the team needs.
   

  

 Inclusive Team Culture
   

  

 Here at AWS, it’s in our nature to learn and be curious. Our employee-led affinity groups foster a culture of inclusion that empower us to be proud of our differences. Ongoing events and learning experiences, including our Conversations on Race and Ethnicity (CORE) and AmazeCon (gender diversity) conferences, inspire us to never stop embracing our uniqueness.
   

  

 Mentorship and Career Growth
   

  

 We’re continuously raising our performance bar as we strive to become Earth’s Best Employer. That’s why you’ll find endless knowledge-sharing, mentorship and other career-advancing resources here to help you develop into a better-rounded professional.
   

  

**Basic Qualifications**
 Basic Qualifications:
   

  

 Extensive experience performing security investigations, penetration testing, and/or incident response in the context of large organisations.
   

  

 In-depth understanding of security threats, hands-on experience detecting and defending from cyber-attacks, and experience using big data analytics and orchestration to address security challenges.
   

  

 Demonstrated technical leadership in security (e.g., tech lead, developed security architecture for a product or system, led technical component of security project, etc.).
   

  

 Experience leading and coaching junior security engineers to improve their skills and effectiveness
   

  

**Preferred Qualifications**
 University Degree in a STEM related field
   

  

 Understanding of the Mitre ATT&CK framework and knowledge of host and network telemetry data (e.g., process lists, application logs, NetFlow)
   

  

 Have awareness and understanding of current cyber security threats, actors and their techniques Experience with data science, big data analytics technology stack, analytic development for endpoint and network security, and streaming technologies (e.g., Kafka, Spark Streaming, and Kinesis)
   

  

 Strong sense of ownership combined with collaborative approach to overcoming challenges and influencing organisational change
   

  

 Amazon is an equal opportunities employer. We believe passionately that employing a diverse workforce is central to our success. We make recruiting decisions based on your experience and skills. We value your passion to discover, invent, simplify and build. Protecting your privacy and the security of your data is a longstanding top priority for Amazon. Please consult our Privacy Notice (https://www.amazon.jobs/en/privacy\_page) to know more about how we collect, use and transfer the personal data of our candidates.
   

  

 Our inclusive culture empowers Amazonians to deliver the best results for our customers. If you have a disability and need a workplace accommodation or adjustment during the application and hiring process, including support for the interview or onboarding process, please visit https://amazon.jobs/content/en/how-we-hire/accommodations for more information. If the country/region you’re applying in isn’t listed, please contact your Recruiting Partner.
   

  

  

**Company** 
 - AWS EMEA SARL (Sweden Branch)
